mil7.6.1:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘sīhassa satta aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni satta aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.6.1:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena setavimalaparisuddhapaṇḍaracittena byapagatakukkuccena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.6.1:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sīhassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.6.1:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sīho catucaraṇo vikkantacārī;
mil7.6.1:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena caturiddhipādacaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.6.1:6.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sīhassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.6.1:7.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena abhirūparucirasīlakesarinā bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.6.1:7.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sīhassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.6.1:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sīho jīvitapariyādānepi na kassaci onamati;
mil7.6.1:8.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārapariyādānepi na kassaci onamitabbaṃ.
mil7.6.1:8.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sīhassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.6.1:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sīho sapadānabhakkho yasmiṃ okāse nipatati, tattheva yāvadatthaṃ bhakkhayati, na varamaṃsaṃ vicināti;
mil7.6.1:9.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sapadānabhakkhena bhavitabbaṃ, na kulāni vicinitabbāni, na pubbagehaṃ hitvā kulāni upasaṅkamitabbāni, na bhojanaṃ vicinitabbaṃ, yasmiṃ okāse kabaḷaṃ ādīyati, tasmiṃyeva okāse bhuñjitabbaṃ sarīrayāpanatthaṃ, na varabhojanaṃ vicinitabbaṃ.
mil7.6.1:9.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sīhassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.6.1:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sīho asannidhibhakkho, sakiṃ gocaraṃ bhakkhayitvā na puna taṃ upagacchati;
mil7.6.1:10.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena asannidhikāraparibhoginā bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.6.1:10.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sīhassa chaṭṭhaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.6.1:11.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sīho bhojanaṃ aladdhā na paritassati, laddhāpi bhojanaṃ agadhito amucchito anajjhosanno paribhuñjati;
mil7.6.1:11.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena bhojanaṃ aladdhā na paritassitabbaṃ, laddhāpi bhojanaṃ agadhitena amucchitena anajjhosannena ādīnavadassāvinā nissaraṇapaññena paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
mil7.6.1:11.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sīhassa sattamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.6.1:11.4: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena saṃyuttanikāyavare theraṃ mahākassapaṃ parikittayamānena—
mil7.6.1:12.1: ‘Santuṭṭhoyaṃ, bhikkhave, kassapo itarītarena piṇḍapātena, itarītarapiṇḍapātasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī, na ca piṇḍapātahetu anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ āpajjati, aladdhā ca piṇḍapātaṃ na paritassati, laddhā ca piṇḍapātaṃ agadhito amucchito anajjhosanno ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjatī’”ti.
